loans.use: to buy startup grocery products and do business

loans.name: Wendpouire De Markoussi Group

texts.fr:
Mme  BIBATA  est responsable du groupe WENDPOUIRE DE MARKOUSSI. Elle est mariée et mère de 05 enfants. Le plus  âgé a 31 ans et le moins âgé a 18 ans. 01 enfant va à l’école et elle a 06 personnes en charge.
Mme vend des  légumes et des céréales  depuis 30 ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans les villages environnants.
Elle veut s’acheter  02sacs d’oignons et 01 sac de 25kg de petit mil.
Elle veut utiliser les bénéfices pour agrandir son commerce. Elle ambitionne  aider son mari à nourrir les enfants et payer leur scolarité.
texts.en:
Mrs. Bibata is the person responsible for the Wendpouire de Markoussi group. She is the married mother of five children, the eldest of whom is 31 and the youngest 18 years old. One child goes to school and she has six persons under her care.

She has been selling vegetables and cereals for the past 30 years, and resupplies in surrounding villages. She wants to buy two bags of onions and one 25-kilo bag of pearl millet.

She wants to use the profits to expand her business, and her ambition is to help her husband feed the children and pay their school fees.

loans.use: buy two bags of onions and one 25-kilo bag of pearl millet

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is 51 years old, married with four children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks like soft drinks, coffee,  noodles, shampoo, etc. to sell.

Juliet has borrowed and paid 7 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 5 years and also earns an income from food vending.

Juliet aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks like softdrinks, coffee,  noodles, shampoo, etc. to sell

loans.name: Lalaine

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Lalaine works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell rice business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from vegetable vending. Lalaine is borrowing PHP 9500 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell for her buy and sell rice business.

Lalaine has been sustaining her business activities through her past 3 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase cereals and condiments.

loans.name: Raquel

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16000 loan through NWTF in order to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell in her store.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Raquel dreams that one day, She will be able to save enough to provide a secure future for her family

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell in her store.

Lourdes has been sustaining her business activities through her past 22 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

Abigail requested a PHP 25000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional fishing materials such as fishing net, gasoline for her boat and other materials for her business.

Abigail has been in this business for 3 years now.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing materials such as fishing net, gasoline for her boat and other materials for her business

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 17000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell in her store.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Ester dreams that one day, She will be able to save enough money to expand her business and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell in her store

loans.name: Ma. Luz

texts.en:
Ma. Luz is 51 years old and married with seven children, three of whom i school.

She earns a living by farming sugarcane and rice in the Philippines. Ma. Luz is borrowing PHP 18000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Ma. Luz has been farming sugarcane and rice for 30 years and also earns additional income from buy and sell rice and general store.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. 

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to  save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Teresa is 44 years old and has three children are still in school.

Teresa has a fishing business in the Philippines. Teresa requested a PHP 16000 loan amount through NWTF to buy gasoline for her boat, additional fishing net and other materials for her boat.

Teresa has been in this business for 5 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy gasoline for her boat, additional fishing net and other materials for her boat

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy millet, sorghum and rice.

loans.name: Solomon

texts.en: Solomon is a married man. He has 4 children. He describes himself to be determined. He operates a tailoring shop where he makes clothes. He has been involved in this business for 30 years. His business is located in a busy area and his primary customers are of all kinds. He describes his biggest business challenge to be insufficient capital. He will use the Kes 30,000 loan to buy more stock of tailoring materials. His business goal is to expand within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will have improved living standards. This is his third loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. Previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: buy more stock of tailoring materials

loans.name: Charlita

texts.en:
Charlita works hard to support her family. Charlita is single and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Charlita requested a PHP 6000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Charlita has been in this business for 2 years now.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Villen

texts.en:
Villen is a hardworking woman entrepreneur.

She runs a food vending in the Philippines and requested a PHP 17000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like general store.

Villen dreams that one day, She will be able to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Michele

texts.en:
Michele is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a restaurant business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 35000 through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients like spices, meat, can goods, vegetables, etc for her restaurant business.

Michele has been in this business for 5 years. Michele earns more income from general store, pig fattening and selling purified water.

Michele has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients like spices, meat, can goods, vegetables, etc

loans.name: Biyea Ii Group

texts.fr:
Mme FATI est responsable du groupe BIYEA II. Elle est veuve et mère de 04 enfants. Le plus âgé a 32 ans et le moins âgé a 18 ans. 02 enfants vont à l’école.
Madame est coiffeuse depuis 10 ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans les marchés environnants.
Elle compte acheter avec l’argent octroyé,  05 douzaine de mèches et 02 paquets de pommades.
Elle veut utiliser les bénéfices du prêt pour s’occuper de la scolarité de ses enfants. Elle ambitionne  agrandir son salon et payer une parcelle.
texts.en:
Fati is the supervisor of the Biyea II group. She is a widow and the mother of four children. The eldest is 32 and the youngest 18 years old. Two of them attend school. She has been a hairdresser for ten years. She buys her supplies in the local markets. With the loan proceeds, she plans to buy five dozen hair extensions and two packets of hair cream.
She wants to use the profits from this loan to pay for her children's schooling costs. Her ambition is to expand her salon and to buy a plot of land.

loans.use: to purchase hair products.

loans.name: Iakob

texts.en: Iakob is 21 years old. He is married and lives with his wife, two children and parents in Bolnisi district. The family has a cow and they produce dairy products to sell. His father works at the local bakery. Iakob wants to open his own Georgian bread bakery and requested a loan. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables him to get a loan of 5,000 GEL. He owns a commercial space and will buy all the needed equipment. His father will share his knowledge and Iakob will bake normal Georgian bread himself. He hopes the business will be profitable, as the location is very populous. The new business initiative, financed with the Kiva Start-up loan will significantly improve the living conditions of the family and Iakob will be able to provide for his children’s education in the future.

loans.use: to open a Georgian bread bakery.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy plastic shoes

loans.name: Jiana

texts.en:
Jiana works hard to support her family. Jiana is married and has a buy and sell charcoal business in the Philippines.

Jiana requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell.

Jiana has been in this business for 10 years now, and also earns additional income from general store.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Luna

texts.en:

Luna requested a PHP 8000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients like meat, fish, spices, flour, cooking oil and other utensils for her food production business.

Luna has been in this business for 10 years now, and also earns additional income from raising pigs.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like meat, fish, spices, flour, cooking oil and other utensils for her food production business

loans.name: Rudesa

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like food vending and motorcycle transport.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. 

Rudesa dreams that one day She will be able to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks like softdrinks, sardines, milk, etc. to sell

loans.name: Cladim

texts.en:
Cladim is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Cladim is 43 years old and has two children are still in school.

Cladim has a fishing business in the Philippines. Cladim requested a PHP 8000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fishing net, bamboo, gasoline for her boat and other materials for her business.

Cladim has been in this business for 5 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fishing net, bamboo, gasoline for her boat and other materials for her business

loans.name: Azimkan

texts.ru: Азимкан, 32 года, замужем, 2 детей, уже много лет занимается животноводством. На сегодняшний день в своем хозяйстве Азимкан имеет 2 коровы. Она знает технологию ведения сельскохозяйственной деятельности и умеет вкладывать средства по назначению. Ее ежемесячный доход составляет около 11,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Азимкан обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 15,000 сом (KGS) на покупку корма для скота. Азимкан намерена свои доходы вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие бизнеса.
texts.en:
Azimkan is 32 and married with two children. She has been working in animal husbandry for many years and currently has two cows on her farm. She has strong technical skills when it comes to farming and knows how to properly follow a budget and plan. Her monthly income is about 11,000 KGS.

With the goal of further developing her business, Azimkan has approached Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 15,000 KGS to purchase livestock feed. She intends to put profits from the loan into further developing her business.

loans.use: to buy livestock feed in order to invest in her business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy vegetables

loans.name: Jewel

texts.en:
Jewel is 41 years old and married with two children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Jewel runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 11000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

She has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, noodles, personal care products and other groceries. 

In the future Jewel would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Ma. Cecilia

texts.en:
Ma. Cecilia is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Ma. Cecilia is 36 years old and has two children are still in school.

Ma. Cecilia has a buy and sell fruits business in the Philippines. Ma. Cecilia requested a PHP 7000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more banana to sell in the market.

Ma. Cecilia has been in this business for 6 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more banana to sell in the market

loans.name: Marilou

Marilou requested a PHP 6000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Marilou has been in this business for 3 years now, and also earns additional income from buy and sell vegetable.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Ruby

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Ruby works hard to support her family.

She has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening.  Ruby is borrowing PHP 18000 through NWTF to  purchase additional spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle for her motorcycle transport business.

Ruby has been sustaining her business activities through her past 12 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle

loans.name: Salvacion

texts.en:
Salvacion is 62 years old and married with four children.

She earns a living by farming sugarcane in the Philippines. Salvacion is borrowing PHP 23000 through NWTF to pays for laborers salaries for land preparation.

Salvacion has been farming sugarcane  for 9 years and also earns additional income from buy and sell rice.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. 

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to pays for laborers salaries for land preparation

loans.name: Tujyinama Group

texts.en: Tujyinama is a group led by Beatrice, who is 51 years old. The group's name means “Advisory” in English. She is married with four children aged between 6 and 25 years old. She owns a bar and has been doing business for the past 20 years. The group members sell different items and they have the same idea for changing their life. With the loan, she would like to buy more beer and soda to sell. The profits from the business will be used to improve her standard of living and pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy more beer and soda to sell.

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Myrna is 45 years old and has three children are presently in school.

Myrna has a buy and sell vegetable business in the Philippines. Myrna requested a PHP 6000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more vegetable to sell such as squash, egg plant, water spinach, sweet potato and other vegetable.

Myrna has been in this business for 6 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more vegetable to sell such as squash, egg plant, water spinach, sweet potato and other vegetable

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:

Nida has a fishing business in the Philippines. Nida requested a PHP 10000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional fish net, gasoline for her boat and other materials for her business.

Nida has been in this business for 10 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional fish net, gasoline for her boat and other materials for her business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy used clothing

loans.name: Joebert

texts.en:
Joebert is a 36-year-old man from Mcarthur, Leyte. He engages in raising and selling hogs. He has been raising hogs for almost 5 years now. He is in need of funds to finance this business.


Joebert has requested a loan in the amount of 10,000 PHP to buy piglets, pig feed and purchase materials for pig pen renovation. In this way, Joebert will be able to resume his hog raising business and be able to handle it properly. His income will augment and his financial situation will be smoothed.    

In the future, he dreams to expand his business to become sustainable and for him to be able to finance the schooling of his close relative for a brighter future.

loans.use: to buy piglets, pig feed and purchase materials for pig pen renovation

loans.name: Jona

texts.en:
As a married mother of two children, Jona works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fish vending. Jona is borrowing PHP 20000 through NWTF to buy fishing gear and new engine for her fishing boat.

Jona has been sustaining her business activities through her past 24 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business and improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and new engine for her fishing boat.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
As a married parent of eight children, Teresita works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell oyster business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming sugarcane and fish pond operator. Teresita is borrowing PHP 22000 through NWTF to  purchase additional sacks of oyster to sell for her buy and sell oyster business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. 

Teresita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 16 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of oyster to sell

loans.name: Ma. Chinky

texts.en:
Ma. Chinky works hard to support herself. She is single and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Ma. Chinky requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

She has been in this business for seven years.

In the future, Ma. Chinky would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell

loans.name: Loussia

texts.fr: Loussia est une femme célibataire de 66 ans. Loussia habite dans le quartier de Lomé avec deux enfants à sa charge. Loussia s’active dynamiquement pour subvenir aux besoins de sa famille. Loussia vend des habits traditionnels et arrive à gagner son profit grâce à cette activité. Loussia achète ses provisions une fois par mois et sollicite ce prêt pour commander des habits traditionnels à vendre et réaliser plus de bénéfice.
texts.en:
Loussia is 66 years old and single.  She lives in a district of Lomé and is responsible for two children.  She works hard to provide for the needs of her family and makes a living selling traditional clothing.  

Loussia buys her stock once a month and she will use her loan to order more traditional clothing for sale.

loans.use: to buy 6 quantities of traditional clothing for sale.

loans.name: Nadou

texts.fr: Veuve et âgée de 62 ans, Nadou est une femme mère de trois enfants. Nadou habite à Tokoin et vend des produits d’alimentations générales dans son quartier afin de gagner sa rentabilité. Pour arriver à ses fins, Nadou s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché local. Pour commander des papiers hygiéniques, des mouchoirs et des sachets, Nadou  demande ce prêt pour réaliser son achat et disposer d’un revenu afin d’aider ses enfants dans leurs éducations.
texts.en:
Nadou is 62 years old, widowed and mother to three children.  She lives in Tokoin and sells general food and other products in her area to earn a living.

Twice a month, Nadou buys new supplies from the local market.  She has requested this loan to enable her to buy toilet paper, tissues and plastic bags.  Her earnings will be used to help her children with their education.

loans.use: to buy 15 packets of toilet paper, 15 packets of tissues and 15 lots of plastic bags for her retail business.

loans.name: Jose Rosendo

texts.es:
José Rosendo vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Callayuc, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de café, su esposa le apoya en esta labor preparando los alimentos para brindarles a los jornaleros que trabajan dando mantenimiento al cultivo de café, cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de abono y fertilizantes para brindar su mantenimiento a su cultivo de café y de esta manera tener una producción buena para ofrecer a sus clientes lo que incrementará su nivel de ventas y por ende su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
José Rosendo lives with his wife and children in the Callayuc district. His town is a farming, trade and stock breeding community in Cutervo Province, which is part of the Cajamarca region, in the northern highlands of Peru.

He makes his living from agriculture and more specifically as a coffee grower. His wife supports him in this endeavour by preparing food for the day labourers who maintain the coffee crops. He has a great deal of experience in the business and is well-thought of on a personal and professional level in the district. 

He is requesting a loan to buy compost and fertiliser to have the resources to maintain his coffee crop and ensure a good production for his customers.  This will increase his sales and consequently his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertiliser to have the resources to maintain his coffee crop

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy peanuts for resale.

loans.name: Dúo Azucenas De San Pedro Group

texts.es: La encargada de este grupo es la señora Blanca, quien tiene una venta de frutas en el mercado. Su sueño es tener un local propio. El verano exige la venta de mucha fruta y le hacen falta otros tipos de fruta en el negocio. Ella necesita otro préstamo para comprar fruta y ofrecerle lo más fresco, delicioso y limpio a las personas y para vender mucho y tener buenas ganancias.
texts.en: Blanca is the head of this group. She has a fruit stall at the market. Blanca’s dream is to own her own premises. Fruit sales are high during the summer and Blanca needs more types of fruits for her business. Blanca needs another loan to buy fruit. She can then sell a fresher, tastier, cleaner product to customers. She can sell a lot, and then earn a good profit.

loans.use: to buy consumable goods to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy accessories for his motorcycle taxi and to carry out repairs and maintenance on this same vehicle, which is currently in bad condition.

loans.name: Anecita

Anecita has been in this business for 9 years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like threads and others tailoring materials

Mercedita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

She has been in this business for eight years and sells a variety of items such as snack food, noodles, canned goods and other groceries. 

In the future Mercedita would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell

Delia works hard to support her family. Delia is married and has a musical performance business in the Philippines.

Delia has been in this business for 10 years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like  chairs, tables and the maintenance of her videoke machine

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en:
Elsie is 52 years old and married with four children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like milk, soap, noodles, can goods, chips, etc.

Elsie has been in this business for 10 years.

In the future Elsie would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like milk, soap, noodles, can goods, chips, etc

loans.name: Dolores

Dolores is 63 years old, married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Dolores has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Dolores requested a PHP 13000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell.

Dolores has been in this business for thirty years. In the future, Dolores would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group

loans.name: Melyn

Melyn is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Melyn requested a PHP 9,500 loan through NWTF in order to buy medicine and vaccines for her pigs.

Melyn has been raising pigs for ten years now, and has borrowed 5 times in the past from NWTF to sustain this business.

In the future, Melyn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy medicine and vaccines for her pigs

loans.name: Gerlie

As a married parent of five children, Gerlie works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell dried coconut meat business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from general store.  Gerlie is borrowing PHP 30000 through NWTF to  purchase more stocks of dried coconut meat to sell for her buy and sell dried coconut meat business.

Gerlie has been sustaining her business activities through her past 22 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

Merla has borrowed and paid 11 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 5 years and also earns an income from food vending.

She aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

Narcefa has been in this business for 9 years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.name: Pacita

Pacita is 61 years old and married.

She is in the agricultural business farming rice in the Philippines. Pacita requested a PHP 30000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Pacita has been farming rice for 8 years now, and has borrowed 29 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.name: Susana

texts.es:
Susana es una madre de familia de 59 años de edad, es casada tiene una linda familia de 10 hijos de las edades entre 14 y 38 años, esta humilde familia vive en una comunidad de Suchitepéquez.
Susana con el afán de obtener sus ingresos y mantener a su familia se dedica atendiendo su molino de nixtamal que se encuentra en su casa, pero para mejorar sus ingresos también se dedica al cultivo de maíz.
Susana es una madre que le preocupa las comodidades de su familia, es por ello que se ha dado cuenta que es necesario cambiar el techo de la casa, pues ya se encuentra en mal estado y con muchas goteras, aunque Susana se ha esforzado mucho para poder comparar nuevas laminas, no lo ha logrado, es por eso que acude a un préstamo para poder comprar una línea de láminas.
Susana guarda las esperanzas de conseguir el crédito para poder cambiar el  techo de su casa, y sueña con poder dejarle a cada hijo una casa donde puedan vivir con sus familias.
texts.en:
Susana is a 59-year-old mother. She is married with a beautiful family of 10 children between the ages of 14 and 38. This humble family live in a municipality of Suchitepéquez.

In order to make money and keep her family, Susana operates a corn mill in her house, but to improve her income she also grows corn. As a mother, Susana is concerned about the family's comfort. It is for this reason that she has realised that she needs to replace the roof on her house, which is in a poor condition with many leaks.

Despite making huge efforts to buy metal sheets, she has not managed to do so, which is why she is resorting to a loan to buy a set of metal sheets. Susana hopes she will obtain the loan to be able to replace the roof on her house, and she dreams of being able to leave all of her children a house to live in with their families.

loans.use: to buy metal sheets to renovate the roof of her home

loans.name: Sitti Mohana

She requested a PHP 25000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients like yeast, flour, margarine, sugar, etc.

Sitti Mohana has been in this business for 10 years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like yeast, flour, margarine, sugar, etc

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. 

Teresita aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.name: Dúo María De San Pedro Group

texts.es: La encargada de este grupo es doña Francisca quien se dedica a la venta de ropa típica desde hace varios años. Vende de forma ambulante en las calles principales de su localidad. Las fiestas del pueblo se aproximan y tiene varios pedidos de trajes típicos por tal motivo necesita otro préstamo para no quedarles mal a sus clientes. Su sueño es tener un hermoso local en el mercado del pueblo.
texts.en: The supervisor of this group is Francisca who has been selling typical clothing for several years.  She works as a vendor in the main streets of her town.  The local festivities are approaching and she has several orders for typical clothing.  Therefore she is requesting a loan to fill the orders.  Her dream is to have a beautiful shop in the village market.

loans.use: To buy new typical clothing to sell.

loans.name: Erlyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Erlyn works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming rice. Erlyn is borrowing PHP 13000 through NWTF to purchase more stocks of dried fish, rice, noodles, egg, etc for her general store business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. 

Erlyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 6 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of dried fish, rice, noodles, egg, etc

loans.name: Melona

texts.en:
Melona is 35 years old, married and has two children, one of which is in school.

Melona has a farm, raising pigs in the Philippines. Melona requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Melona has been raising pigs for five years now, and has borrowed 2 times in the past from NWTF for her farm.

In the future, Melona would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Norelyn

texts.en:
Norelyn is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with two children.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like can goods, spices, noodles, chips, egg, etc.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like fish vending.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. 

Norelyn dreams that one day She will be able to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like can goods, spices, noodles, chips, egg, etc

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en:
Corazon is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Corazon is 59 years old and has one children who are in school.

Corazon has a food vending business in the Philippines. Corazon requested a PHP 8000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food business.

She has been in this business for five years. In the future, Corazon would like to save enough money to expand her business and support the financial stability for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Karina Elizabeth

texts.es: A su corta edad Karina tiene un hijo de 1 año. Karina tiene 18 años y es madre soltera, Karina vive con su madre, hermanos, padrastro y su hijo. Ella trabaja de jornalera en el campo y se dedica  a la crianza de animales menores. Karina solicita el credito para invertirlo en la compra de pollos. Karina comenta que sus deseos son los de mejorar su negocio comprando mas pollos y seguir en su trabajo de jornalera pero con la alegria de que su hijo tenga la alimentacion, vestido y cubrir las demas necesidades de su hijo.
texts.en: Karina, 18, is single and already has a one-year-old son.  She lives with her mother, siblings, step-father and son, and works as a wage earner on a farm, and also raises small animals.  The loan Karina is requesting is to buy chickens.  She says her greatest desire is to improve her business by buying more chickens.  She wants to continue her farm job, but with the happiness of knowing her son will be well fed and clothed, and have all his needs taken care of.

loans.use: To buy chickens.

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Daisy is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Daisy is 37 years old and has three children who are in school.

Daisy has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Daisy requested a PHP 10000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more sea foods to sell.

Daisy has been in this business for four years. In the future, Daisy would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more sea foods to sell.

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Melanie is 34 years old and married with four children.  With three children in school, Melanie works very hard to provide for them.

Melanie runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

Melanie has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as snack food, canned goods and other groceries. 

In the future Melanie would like to build and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Hernalyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Hernalyn works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending and selling clothing sells.  Hernalyn is borrowing PHP 17000 through NWTF to buy fishing materials for the maintenance for her fishing business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. 

Hernalyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 10 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials for the maintenance of her business

loans.name: Gerber Mauricio

texts.es:
Gerber de 51 años de edad, no posee ningún estudio académico, actualmente está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene dos hijos de los cuales solo una de ellas vive junto a él y está estudiando bachillerato.

Él tiene muchos años de trabajar en la agricultura, cultiva dos hectáreas de jícama y también trabaja como jornalero arando la tierra con sus bueyes.


Él necesita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas como abonos y para pagar el alquiler de la tierra.

El objetivo principal en su vida es que su hija menor logre graduarse de bachillerato y sabe con su trabaja y la ayuda de sus créditos lo podrá lograr.
texts.en:
Gerber, 51, did not receive an education.  He is married and his wife takes care of the home.  They have two children but only the daughter still lives at home and attends high school.

For many years he has worked in agriculture, cultivating hectares of jicama fruit.  He also works as a wage earner ploughing fields with oxen.

He is in need of a loan to buy farm supplies, such as fertilizers, and to pay land rental.  

Gerber's main goal in life is for his daughter to graduate from high school.  He knows that through his work and with the help of the loan he can meet his goal.

loans.use: To buy farm supplies such as fertilizers, and pay land rental.

loans.name: Rezil

texts.en:
Rezil is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Rezil is 34 years old and has one child who is in school.

Rezil has a general store business in the Philippines. Rezil requested a PHP 14000 loan amount through NWTF in order to purchase more items like canned goods, shampoo, sugar and other personal care products.

Rezil has been in this business for four years. In the future, Rezil would like to build and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items like canned goods, shampoo, sugar and other personal care products.

loans.name: Jeanylyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Jeanylyn works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming rice.  Jeanylyn is borrowing PHP 12000 through NWTF to purchase more stocks of household goods to sell for her general store business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. 

Jeanylyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 24 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business and save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of household goods to sell

loans.name: Nelma

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Nelma works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buy and sell fish. Nelma is borrowing PHP 19000 through NWTF to buy additional fishing net for her business for her fishing business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. 

Nelma has been sustaining her business activities through her past 6 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing net for her business

loans.name: José Joaquin

texts.es: José es un Santandereano de 42 años de edad, nacido en cuna de comerciantes y tenderos, desde niño estuvo involucrado en éste negocio en el cual fue ayudante en varias tiendas, pero una vez aprendió todo el manejo de éste formato de negocio, viajó a la ciudad de Barranquilla, donde con ayuda de familiares y amigos inicio su propio negocio.  José se encuentra muy consolidado y cuenta con un manejo muy amplio en su negocio, puesto que ya tiene 10 años de estar funcionando y una experiencia de toda la vida. Sus compras las genera de contado para mantener excelentes márgenes de ganancia y una mejor oferta a sus clientes, las ventas en un 80% son de contado y el otro 20% a crédito.   En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para invertir en la compra de víveres como arroz, aceite, panela, azúcar, legumbres, productos lácteos y carnes, para optimizar el inventario, puesto que estos productos de la canasta familiar son de fácil rotación y consumo.  José considera que esta inversión mejorará su indicador de servicio puesto que el cliente encontrará todo en un mismo lugar.  José es padre de dos hijos de 15 y 16 años y una hija de 7 años de edad  a quienes desea ofrecerles una casa propia, educación y bienestar.  Su meta a largo plazo es hacer crecer su negocio y tener otra tienda.
texts.en:
Jose, 42, is from Santander.  He was born in the cradle of merchants and store-keepers.  Since he was a child he has worked as an assistant in several stores.  But once he learned how to manage the business he traveled to Barranquilla where families and friends helped him open his own business.

Jose has a very solid business and vast experience.  He opened his store ten years ago and has life-long experience.  He purchases store goods in cash to keep a high profit margin while offering his customers low prices.  He conducts 80% of sales in cash and 20% on credit.

He is currently applying for a CrediKiva loan, his first through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, to buy goods such as rice, oil, cane sugar, sugar, legums, dairy products and meats.  This is to optimize his inventory since daily consumer goods have a fast turn-around.  Jose believes this investment will improve his service rating as customers will find everthing in one place.  

Jose has two sons, ages 15 and 16, and a 7-year-old daughter.  He wants them to have a proper home, education and well-being.  His long-term goal is to grow his business and open another store.

loans.use: To buy goods such as rice, oil, cane sugar, sugar, legumes, dairy products and meat.

loans.name: Joan Marie

texts.en:
Joan Marie  is 22 years old and single. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Joan Marie has a general store business in the Philippines. Joan Marie requested a PHP 12000 loan amount through NWTF in order to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

Joan Marie has been in this business for two years. In the future, Joan Marie would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Heidy

Heidy is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with six children, two of whom in school.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 23000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like soap, milk, sugar, egg, etc.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like pig fattening.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. 

Heidy dreams that one day She will be able to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college

loans.use: to buy items to sell like soap, milk, sugar, egg, etc

loans.name: Rebecca

Rebecca is 32 years old and married with two children who are both in school. Rebecca works very hard to provide for them.

Rebecca runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 9000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Rebecca has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, noodles, school supplies and other personal products. 

In the future Rebecca would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy and sell rice grains business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 20000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice grains to sell for her buy and sell rice grains business.

Irene has been in this business for 28 years. Irene earns more income from farming rice.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. 

Irene has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice grains to sell

loans.name: Grupo Las Cruces 3 Group

texts.es:
Yasmin  (es la primera del lado izquierdo de la fotografía de blusa negra) es una mujer de 24 años de edad, es casada tiene una linda hija de dos años de edad, esta hermosa familia vive en una comunidad de Suchitepéquez.
Para Yasmin no hay nada más importante que su familia es por ello que para darles lo mejor y no tenerlos con carencias se dedica  a la costura de telas y elaboración  de blusas, estas labores los realiza desde hace tres años en el lugar de su domicilio.
Yasmin es una mujer entusiasta que le gusta seguir superándose es por ello que ahora ha tomado la decisión de mejorar sus costuras para ofrecerle a la clientela una diversidad de blusas con diferentes estilos y colores, pero una de las dificultades que ella tiene es que  no cuenta con el capital necesario para comprar sus telas, por tal razón se a unido a un grupo de personas para juntas solicitar su crédito.
Yasmin tiene las esperanzas de conseguir el crédito para mejorar la calidad de sus costuras como también mejorar sus ingresos, para luego construir una mejor casa para su familia.
texts.en:
Yasmin (first from the left in a black top) is 24 years old, married, and has a lovely two-year-old daughter.  This beautiful family lives in the community of Suchitepequez.

For Yasmin there is nothing more important than her family, so she wants to give them the best she can so they lack for nothing.  She is a seamstress and makes blouses, and has been working out of her home for three years.

Yasmin is an enthusiastic person who likes to continue improving her situation.  Therefore she wants to upgrade her services by offering her customers blouses in different styles and colors.  But one of the difficulties she runs into is that she does not have the money to buy the fabrics.  So she has joined a communal bank group to request a loan.

Yasmin hopes to receive the loan to improve the quality of her goods and improve her income.  She wants to build a better house for her family.

loans.use: To buy fabric to make blouses.

loans.name: Dilbara

texts.ru: Дилбара, 46 лет, замужем, мать 2 детей. У нее  среднее образование, занимается разведением скота и полеводством. В хозяйстве есть жеребенок, 15 овец. На 2,0 Га арендованной земельной доли выращивает фасоль для реализации. Доходы от кредита позволили ей расширить хозяйство. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Дилбара обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) для покупки 10 овец. Доходы от кредита Дилбара планирует вкладывать в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Dilbara is 46 years old, married, and the mother of two children. She has secondary education, and works in livestock farming and field husbandry. On her farm she has a foal and fifteen sheep. On 2 hectares of rented land share she cultivates beans for sale.

The funds from the loan would allow her to expand her farm. In order to further develop her farm, Dilbara has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy ten sheep. Dilbara plans to invest the funds from the loan in the further augmentation of the number of livestock animals she has.

loans.use: to buy 10 sheep for fattening and resale

loans.name: Zarrina

texts.ru: Заррина 37 летняя женщина района Гафуров. Она замужем и мать двоих детей. Детям 15 и 12 лет. Заррина на районе живет вместе мужем, мамой и детьми. Она серьезная женщина. Заррина дома предоставляет услуги портнихи на заказ. Она 5 лет занимается этой деятельности. Заррина выбрала эту деятельностью, потому что ее мама раньше занималась этой сфере деятельностью. В швейном деле ей нравиться ежедневный доход и общаться с новыми клиентами. Заррина решила расширить деятельность и привлечь больше клиентов. За счет кредита она хочет купить швейные принадлежности. С такими планами она обратилась к Вам за кредитом. Ее мечта в будущем открыть свое ателье по шитью национальной женской одежды.
texts.en:
Zarrina is a 37 year old woman from the Gafurov district. She is married and the mother of two children. Her children are 15 and 12 years old. Zarrina lives together with her husband, mother and children in the district. She is a serious woman. 

Zarrina renders tailoring services to order from home. She has been in this business for five years. Zarrina chose this business because her mother used to work in this field of business. In the sewing business, she likes the daily income and speaking with new clients. 

Zarrina has decided to expand her business and to attract more clients. With the loan she wants to buy sewing supplies. With this plan, she appeals to you for a loan. Her dream for the future is to open her own atelier sewing national clothes for women.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies and expand her business

loans.name: Dil'bar

texts.ru:
Это Дильбар. Ей 51 лет. Она в городе Худжанд живет вместе мужем, сыном, невесткой и внукам. Сыну 27 лет. Невестке 25 лет и внуку 4 года. Ее муж занимается водителем в производительном цехе самбусы.
У Дильбар имеется помещение, где она печет самбусы. Дильбар печет вкусные самбусы. Ее самбуса знаменит своими вкусами и запахами. Она уже 3 года продвигает свою любимую делу. У нее имеется много клиентов, и она печет на заказ. Сейчас Дильбар решила расширить свой бизнес. Она хочет взять кредит, и за счет кредита она намерена приобрести большую духовку, чтобы испечь больше самбусы на продажу. По этой причине Дильбар обратилась за кредитом. Это кредит поможет ей расширить деятельность и увеличить доход.
texts.en:
This is Dil'bar. She is 51 years old. She lives in Khujand city together with her husband, son, daughter-in-law and grandson. Her son is 27 years old, her daughter-in-law is 25 years old, and her grandson is 4 years old. Her husband works as a driver in a samosa-producing shop. 

Dil'bar has premises where she bakes samosas. Dil'bar bakes delicious samosas. Her samosas are famous for their taste and aroma. She has been pushing forward with her beloved business for three years. She has many clients, and she bakes to order. 

Now Dil'bar has decided to expand her business. She wants to take a loan, and with the loan she intends to obtain a large oven, so that she can bake more samosas for sale. For this reason, Dil'bar has applied for a loan. This loan will help her to expand her business and increase her income.

loans.use: to buy an oven for baking samosas and to expand her business

loans.name: Beishekan

texts.ru: Бейшекан погасила свой кредит, она благодарна Фонду Кива и помогшим ей в финансировании. На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве есть 3 коровы, 30 овец, 4 лошади. На ежедневной основе Бейшекан реализует молоко местным жителям, оно пользуется большим спросом и приносит хорошую прибыль. На 1,0 Га земли выращивает картофель, кукурузу и клевер.  В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Бейшекан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку нетелей для увеличения поголовья. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства и хочет построить сарай.
texts.en:
Beishekan has repaid her loan, and she is thankful to Kiva and those who have helped her with the financing. Today on her farm she has three cows, thirty sheep and four horses. On a daily basis, Beishekan sells milk to the local residents. There is a huge demand for the milk and it reaps a good profit. On 1 hectare of land she cultivates potatoes, corn and clover.

In order to further develop her business, Beishekan has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) to buy heifers to increase her livestock headcount. She plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further augmentation of her farm, and she wants to build a barn.

loans.use: to buy heifers in order to grow her business

loans.name: Ramziya

texts.en:
A hard working, successful talented woman, this is how her neighbors, family members and friends describe Ramziya.

Ramziya is a 45-year-old married mother of five children, who had her first loan in 2002 with Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua. That was a group loan, with a share of $300, which she requested to buy necessary business needs. She then was specialized only in ceramic hand made designs. 

After six years of being a beneficiary of group loan programs,  Ramziya decided to acquire, in 2008, her own Individual loan that was $1300, which she invested in opening a small women and children clothes selling shop, parallel to her special hand made artistic designs. This represented a spectacular improvement in Ramziya's social and financial situation.

Ramziya was nominated and benefited from a trip to Tunisia offered by Al Majmoua, to participate in October 2006 Mediterranean Forum for women with small projects, where her portraits took a lot of success and she got a recognition certificate according to her remarkable work. Ramziya participated in many different exhibitions in several occasions, which helped her a lot in marketing her arts in a very professional way.

Currently, Ramziya moved to a larger shop, and her business capital increased a lot, since she began wholesale trading, parallel to her retail selling shop. She started to travel abroad seeking better quality products, and her dream was very big to accomplish and come true.

Today since Ramziya is expanding her working sector and increasing her business capital. She acquired an SME loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua.  It will help Ramziya increase her business merchandise with special Spring and Summer collections, and expand her working zone in the market.

Ramziya is very optimistic and anxious about this loan which will help her in developing her family's living and her businesses successfully.

loans.use: To increase her business merchandise with special Spring and Summer clothing collections and expand her working zone in the market

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is 35 years old, married to Lawrence and she supports four family members. She has been selling different fruits in the market for the last five years and this business earns her a monthly income of KES.11,000. 

She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from Vision Fund Kenya, which she plans to purchase more stocks of tomatoes and oranges for sale in the market and meet the demand of clients in the market. 

Beatrice plans to use gained profit to repay the loan and to start a retail shop. Her hope is to be financially stable.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of tomatoes and oranges for sale in the market and to meet the demand of clients in the market.

loans.name: Elmira

texts.ru: Эльмира, 43 года, не замужем. У нее средне-специальное образование, с 2005 года она стала заниматься сельским хозяйством. Сегодня в хозяйстве Эльмиры есть 7 коров и 35 овец. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет 20,000 сомов(KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Эльмира обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. В будущем Эльмира планирует направлять доходы от кредита на развитие ее деятельности.
texts.en:
Elmira is 43 years old and unmarried. She has a specialised secondary education, and she started working in farming from 2005. Today on her farm, Elmira has seven cows and 35 sheep. Her monthly profit is 20,000 som (KGS).

In order to further develop her business, Elmira has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock. In the future, Elmira plans to direct the funds from the loan into expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to grow vegetables.

loans.name: Oscar Astul

texts.es:
Oscar de 29 años de edad, actualmente vive junto a sus dos padres, tiene poca preparación académica  y se encuentra soltero.

Desde muy joven, Oscar se ha dedicado a la agricultura, lo cual aprendió de su padre que también se dedicaba a lo mismo, actualmente él cultiva una  hectárea de jícama y espera aumentar la producción de la misma.

Debido a que debe seguir con su cosecha, Oscar solicita este crédito, para pagar el alquiler del terreno donde cultiva y para comprar insumos.

Su sueño es trabajar muy fuerte para poder construir una casa en donde pueda vivir independientemente y sabe que si se esfuerza lo puede lograr.
texts.en:
Oscar is 29 years old. Right now he lives with his parents. He has little education and he is single. 

Since he was young, Oscar has worked in agriculture. He learned it from his father who did the same thing. Right now, he is growing a hectare of jicama and he hopes to increase production.

Because he must continue with his crop, Oscar is asking for this loan to pay rent on the land he rents and buy materials.  

His dream is to work very hard to be able to build a house where he can live independently. He knows if he works hard he can achieve it.

loans.use: to pay the rent on the land he rents and buy materials.

loans.name: Richel

texts.en:
Richel is 32 years old. She is married and her husband works as a heavy equipment operator. They have two children, ages two and twelve. 

Richel helps her husband by selling Avon products like lotion, perfume and cologne. She also operates a Sari-sari store business. Richel requests a loan to buy soft drinks, rice, canned goods and noodles. She and her husband work hard so they can continue sending their children to school and for them to have a better life in the future.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, rice, canned goods and noodles

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To add onto her stock for more income gain and improve family living standards.

loans.name: Lucia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Lucia, de 44 años de edad, es ama de casa, estudio hasta quinto grado, está acompañada y junto a su pareja tiene 6 hijos de 25, 23, 19, 18, 16 y 11 años de edad, de los cuales 3 están en los EE.UU. y los otros 3 trabajan con ella, su pareja se dedica a la albañilería desde hace varios años.

Lucia, se dedica a la crianza de especies menores como pollos de engorde y cerdos; en el invierno se dedica a la agricultura, este trabajo que lo realiza desde hace 25 años y lo aprendió de sus padres, quienes siempre se han dedicado a esta actividad; para llegar a su trabajo camina 3 kilómetros y su horario es de 7:00 a.m. a 4:00 p.m. todos los días.

Lucia, está solicitando el crédito en CREDICAMPO para comprar insumos agrícola para sembrar 21,000 metros cuadrados de granos básico y 31,500 metros cuadrados de hortaliza, de esa manera en poco tiempo tendra mejores ganancias y podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.

El sueño de Lucia, es poder ampliar más su negocio y ahorrar parte de las ganancias para poder ayudarle a sus hijos económicamente, para que estudien y puedan tener mejores oportunidades laborales.
texts.en:
Lucia, 44, works as a housewife. She studied up to the fifth grade. She is married and has six children aged 25, 23, 19, 18, 16, and 11; three of them are in the United States and the remaining three work with her. Her husband has been working as a mason for a few years.

Lucia raises small farm animals such as broilers and pigs. During wintertime she works growing vegetables. She has been doing this for twenty-five years. Her parents, who have always worked in agriculture, taught her. She has to walk 3 km [1.8 miles] to go to work. She works every day, from 7:00 am until 4:00 pm.

Lucia is requesting a loan from CREDICAMPO to buy agricultural supplies to sow different grains in a 21,000 m2 [226,000 ft2] plot of land and vegetables in a 31,500 m2 [339,000 ft2] plot of land. This will help her to make better profits in a short time, and she will be able to improve her family’s living conditions.

Lucia dreams of expanding her business and saving to be able to help her children economically, so that they can study and have better job opportunities.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to grow grains and vegetables.

loans.name: Larisa

texts.en:
Larisa, from Goghovit village in Shirak region, is involved in farming. She lives there with her husband and 18-year-old daughter. 

The farm which she runs includes cows, calves, sheep and hens. Larisa also cultivates wheat. For the development of her farming business, Larisa needs more funds. She applied for this loan to purchase seeds and forage for feeding the livestock to develop her farming business.

Because the region where their village is located is considered poor, and the unemployment rate here is very high, people face numerous difficulties in developing their businesses. Larisa'a loan has been approved within the joint initiative between SEF and Kiva, which provides loans to the underserved population of the Shirak region, to help them to access the market and earn a living. 

Larisa hopes to receive lenders' support.

loans.use: to pay for seeds and forage for feeding livestock and to develop her farming business

loans.name: Julio César

texts.es:
Julio de 56 años de edad, actualmente está acompañado y tiene un hijo que ya no vive con él, su pareja tiene una pequeña tienda en la cual pasa atendiendo sus clientes.

Julio trabaja desde muy joven en la agricultura, específicamente en el cultivo de maíz y frijol además realiza crianza de ganado, por el momento cultiva dos hectáreas de frijol, y también tiene una vaca la cual cuida mucho ya que esta le provee leche todos los días.

Él necesita mucho de este crédito para comprar dos novillas para pastarlas en esta temporada de lluvias pues el pasto es muy abundante.

Su sueño es tener una vivienda digna pues en la que vive actualmente se encuentra en malas condiciones.
texts.en:
Julio is 56 years old. He is married and has a son who doesn't live with him now. His spouse has a small store where she serves her customers. 

Julio has worked in agriculture since he was very young, specifically growing corn and beans. He also raises cattle. At this time, he is growing two hectares of beans. He also has a cow that he cares for a lot because she produces milk every day. 

He really needs this loan to buy two heifers to graze them during this rainy season because the pasture is very abundant.

His dream is to have a worthy house, because the one he lives in now is in poor condition.

loans.use: to buy two heifers to graze them during this rainy season because there is abundant pasture.

loans.name: Chakali

texts.ru: Чакали, 56 лет, замужем, есть 4 детей. У Чакали- среднее образование, много лет она проработала дояркой. Сейчас на пенсии и в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав в 1985 году, благодаря упорному труду Чакали, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 2 дойные коровы с 2 телятами, 2 лошади, 10 овец. На 1,40 Га земли выращивает клевер для реализации. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Чакали обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 бычков для откорма и реализации. Доходы от кредита Чакали планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Chakali is 56 years old and married with four children. Chakali has secondary education, and has worked for many years as a milkmaid. Today she is retired, and as a supplementary provider of income for her family, she works in animal and field husbandry, having started in 1985. 

Thanks to Chakali's persistent hard work, on her farm today there are two dairy cows with two calves, two horses, and ten sheep. On 1.4 hectares of land she cultivates clover for sales. In order to further develop her farm, Chakali has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy two steers for fattening up and selling. Chakali plans to invest the funds from the loan in the further augmentation of her number of livestock animals.

loans.use: to buy 2 steers for fattening and resale

loans.name: Antonia Esmeralda

texts.es:
Antonia, de 24 años de edad, estudió hasta séptimo grado, está casada y su esposo trabaja en la agricultura, tienen una hija y ambos viven con ella.

Antonia, trabaja como empleada doméstica, ella viaja en bus 20 minutos, desde su casa hasta su lugar de trabajo.

Antonia, solicita el crédito para comprar madera, teja, lámina, entre otros materiales; para hacer un muro y hacerle techo, para que no se moje su casa en tiempo de invierno. 

El sueño de Antonia, es tener una mejor vivienda para su familia y tener un vehículo propio para poder movilizarse a su lugar de trabajo.
texts.en:
Antonia is 24 years old. She went to school up to the seventh grade. She is married and her husband works in agriculture. They have a daughter and both of them live her.  

Antonia works as a domestic employee. She travels in bus for 20 minutes from her house to her workplace.

Antonia is asking for the loan to buy wood, tiles, sheeting, and other materials to build a wall and out on a roof so that no water comes into her house during rainy season.  

Antonia's dream is to have a better house for her family and have her own vehicle to be able to get to her workplace.

loans.use: to buy wood, tiles, sheeting and other materials to build a wall and put on a roof so the water doesn't come in during the rainy season.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa, de 60 años de edad, no tiene ningun grado académico, es viuda y se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas, tiene 2 hijos, ambos ya trabajan y tienen sus propias familias, ellos le ayudan económicamente a ella.

Rosa, tiene una tortillería desde hace 5 años, su madre le enseño desde pequeña a hacer tortillas, el negocio está en su casa.

Rosa, necesita el crédito para comprar maíz y leña para seguir vendiendo tortillas.

El sueño de Rosa, es ampliar su negocio y contratar a alguien más para aumentar la producción.
texts.en:
Rosa, 60, did not finish school. She is a widow and works making and selling tortillas. She has two children who work and have their own families. They support her economically.

Rosa has had a tortillería for five years. Her mother taught her how to make tortillas when she was a little girl. She works at home.

Rosa needs this loan to buy corn and firewood to continue selling tortillas. Her dream is to expand her business and hire someone to help her to increase her production.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood to make tortillas.

loans.name: Elda Maribel

texts.es:
Elda de 39 años de edad, estudió hasta 4° en la escuela de la comunidad, se casó y tiene dos hijos que se encuentran estudiando, su esposo emigró a los Estados Unidos hace muchos años para apoyarla con los ingresos económicos.

Elda tiene un negocio de venta de lencería desde hace 7 años, negocio que lo puso gracias a la motivación que le dio una amiga y ahora lo realiza todos los días, sale a vender a la comunidad para llevar el alimento al hogar. 

El crédito que está solicitando a CREDICAMPO es para comprar más productos de lencería para su negocio y también lo ampliará con venta de productos de belleza para damas y caballeros.

Su sueño es reencontrarse nuevamente con su esposo y estar juntos para luchar por darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Elda, 39 years old, went to her community school up to the 4th grade, got married, and has two children who are students. Her husband emigrated to the United States many years ago to support her with his income.
 
Elda has had a business selling lingerie for 7 years, a business which she started thanks to the motivation that a friend gave her, and now she does it every day. She goes out to sell in the community to bring food to the home.

The loan that she is asking CREDICAMPO for is to purchase more lingerie products for her business and also to expand it with the sale of beauty products for women and men.

Her dream is to meet up again with her husband and to be together to struggle to give their children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase more lingerie products for her business and also to expand it with the sale of beauty products for women and men.

loans.name: José Alfredo

texts.es:
José, de 57 años de edad, es jornalero y estudio hasta primer grado, no continuo sus estudios debido a la guerra que se vivia en ese tiempo, está acompañado y tiene 6 hijos de 34, 32, 30, 27, 24 y 22 años de edad, de los cuales 2 de ellos trabajan con él y su pareja se dedica a trabajar en casa.

José, se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganaderia desde hace 45 años, este tipo de trabajo lo aprendio de sus padres, quienes siempre se han dedicado a eso, en el verano se dedica a la crianza de cerdos de engorde, para trasladarse hacia su trabajo camina 4 kilometros y su horario es de 7:00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m. todos los dias.

El crédito que está solicitando es para comprar insumos agricolas para poder cultivar 7,000 metros cuadrados de maiz y 7,000 metros cuadrados de frijol.

El sueño de José, es comprar 2 teneritas para obtener ganacias y asi poder ahorrar para tambien darle a sus 2 hijos la oportunidad de estudiar, para que puedan tener mejores oportunidades laborales.
texts.en:
José, 57 years old, is a day laborer and went to school up to the first grade. He didn't continue his education due to the war that was going on at that time. He is partnered and has 6 children, ages 34, 32, 30, 27, 24, and 22, of whom 2 work with him, and his partner works taking care of the house. 

José has worked in agriculture and animal husbandry for the past 45 years. He learned this type of work from his parents, who always had worked at it. In the summer, he works raising and fattening pigs. To get to his work, he walks 4 kilometers and his schedule is from 7:00 am to 5:00 pm every day.

The loan that he is requesting is to purchase agricultural supplies to be able to grow 7,000 square meters of corn and 7,000 square meters of beans.

José's dream is to purchase 2 calves to get income and in this way be able to save to also provide his 2 children with the opportunity to go to school so that they can have better work opportunities.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies to be able to grow 7,000 square meters of corn and 7,000 square meters of beans.

loans.name: Clara

texts.es:
Clara es una mujer de 21 años de edad, es casada tiene una lino hijo de un año, esta linda familia vive en una comunidad de Sololá.
Clara con el objetivo de obtener algunos ingresos y apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa se dedica a la crianza de pollos y marranos desde hace tres años.
Clara es una mujer digna de admirar pues con el afán de seguir cultivando ahora solicita un crédito que lo utilizara para pagar el alquiler del terreno donde ella cultiva maíz y frijoles, pues lamentablemente ella no cuenta con un terreno propio donde pueda cultivar.
En el futuro sueña con poder mejorar su casa y comprar más terrenos donde pueda cultivar y dejar de alquiler el terreno.
texts.en:
Clara is a 21 year old woman who is married and has a one year old son. This beautiful family lives in a community of Sololá.

Clara, with the goal of obtaining some income and help her husband with the household expenses, has been engaged in raising chickens and pigs for 3 years.

Clara is hardworking woman and in an effort to continue growing has asked for a loan to use to pay for rent of land where she will grow corn and beans. Unfortunately, she does not have her own land where she can grow.

In the future, she dreams to make improvements to their home, and buy more land where she can grow and rent it out.

loans.use: to pay for rent of land.

loans.name: Ana Isabel

texts.es:
Ana de 31 años de edad, solo pudo estudiar hasta tercer grado, está casada y tiene 3 hijos que se encuentran estudiando.

Ana se levanta desde muy temprano todos los días para prepararles los alimentos a sus hijos y mandarlos a la escuela, luego sale a dejar el ganado al potrero para ayudarle a su esposo, además vende tamales y de esta forma obtiene ingresos de diferente actividades, pues siempre está pendiente de que a sus hijos no les falte nada. 

Ella necesita el crédito para comprar dos novillos y los insumos agrícolas para la siembra de maíz y frijol.

Su sueño más grande es ver a sus hijos convertidos en profesionales, ya que sus escasos recursos económicos no es ninguna dificultad para superarse, pues con esfuerzo pueden lograr sus propósitos.
texts.en:
Ana, 31 years old, only could go to school until the third grade. She is married and has 3 children who are students.

Ana gets up very early every day to prepare the food for her children and send them to school. Then, she goes out to bring the cattle to the pasture to help her husband. In addition, she sells tamales and in this way gets income from different activities, and she is always close to her children to ensure they don't lack anything.  

She needs the loan to purchase two young cattle and the agricultural supplies to plant corn and beans. 

Her greatest dream is to see her children become professionals; their limited economic resources aren't a difficulty in improving oneself, since with effort they can achieve all their goals.

loans.use: to purchase two young cattle and agricultural supplies to plant corn and beans.

loans.name: Noeme

texts.en:
Noemi is a hardworking woman entrepreneur.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Noemi dreams that one day, she will be able to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Rosa Mirian

texts.es:
Mirian, de 40 años de edad, estudio hasta quinto grado, ella vive junto a su nuera y a su hijo. 

Mirian, tiene 10 años de vender pupusas, de esa manera ha mantenido a su familia y es de ahí de donde genera los ingresos suficiente para cubrir sus necesidades.

Mirian, necesita el préstamo para remodelar la pupusería, ya que necesita ampliarla, porque la demanda que tiene es mucha y sus clientes no caben.

El sueño de Mirian, es poder dejarle una casa bonita a su hijo y que tenga todas las comodidades para su familia.
texts.en:
Mirian, 40, studied up to the fifth grade. She lives with her son and her daughter-in-law. Mirian has been selling pupusas [thick corn tortillas] for ten years. This is how she has managed to maintain her family and how she generates enough resources to cover their needs.

Mirian needs a loan to remodel her pupusería [an establishment where pupusas are sold]. She needs to enlarge it because the demand is growing and she does not have space for more customers.

Mirian dreams of being able to give his son a beautiful house in which he can live comfortably with his family.

loans.use: to enlarge her pupusería.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina is 56 years old from Ormoc City, Leyte. She is married and all her children are grown. 

Rosalina's husband relies on his construction work for a living. Rosalina tries to help him by cooking snacks to sell in her community. She prepares pancakes and rice cakes to sell for a profit. These snacks she usually cooks using firewood. 

She is asking a loan to buy flour, sugar and plastic cellophane for her snacks. 

Aside from this business, she also raises hogs.

Rosalina hopes to have other business options in the future. Her income will be for food, savings and reinvestment in the same business.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar and plastic cellophane.

loans.name: Adeline

texts.en:
Adeline is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with three children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. She supplements this income with earnings from her charcoal retailing business.

She is now borrowing PHP 19,000 through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Adeline dreams that one day, She will be able to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Ruth Noemy

texts.es:
Ruth, de 20 años de edad, es ama de casa, su nivel de estudio fue hasta tercer año de bachillerato, está acompañada pero no tiene hijos, su pareja trabaja como vigilante desde hace un año y en su casa solo vive con su papá y su pareja.

Ruth, se dedica a los quehaceres de la casa desde que se casó y tambien se dedica a la crianza de pollos indios en su casa, para tener carne y huevos para su consumo y el de su familia. 

Ruth, solicita un préstamo para comprar lámina para construir una galera en el corredor de su casa y poder tener más espacio para sus animales domésticos.

Ruth, sueña con comprar un carro para poder transpotarse y sentirse un poco más segura.
texts.en:
Ruth is 20 years old. She works as a housewife and studied up to the third year of secondary school. She is in a relationship, but has no children. Her partner has been working as a security guard for a year. She lives with him and with her father.

Ruth has been taking care of the household chores since she got married, and she also raises Indian chickens at home in order to have meat and eggs for the family’s own consumption.

Ruth is requesting a loan to buy metal sheets to build a pen in the front yard in order to have a better place where to raise her animals.

Her dream is to be able to buy a car to transport herself and feel safer.

loans.use: to buy metal sheets to build a pen for her chickens.

loans.name: Tsiala

texts.en:
